decision_conditions: Prior to commencement of the proposed single storey rear extension, the works to the outbuilding to reduce its size, as shown on the approved plans, shall be completed. Failing this, this permission will have no effect. The single storey rear extension to which this permission relates shall be begun not later than the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.
Reason: In order to comply with the provisions of the Town and Country Planning Act 1990 (as amended).
| The development hereby approved shall be carried out in accordance with drawing / document title number(s):

PA-2344-00 Rev A (Block and Location Plan); PA-2344-01 Rev A (Existing Ground Floor Plan); PA-2344-02 (Existing First Floor Plan); PA-2344-03 (Existing Loft Plan); PA-2344-04 (Existing Roof Plan); PA-2344-05 (Existing Elevation); PA-2344-06 Rev A (Proposed Ground Floor Plan); PA-2344-07 (Proposed First Floor Plan); PA-2344-08 (Proposed Loft Plan); PA-2344-09 (Proposed Roof Plan); PA-2344-10 Rev A (Proposed Elevations); PA-2344-11 (Existing and Proposed Elevations (Garage))
Reason: For the avoidance of doubt and in the interests of proper planning.
| All external materials to be used in the development shall match the appearance of those of the existing dwellinghouse on site.

Reason: To ensure that the materials harmonise with the surroundings, in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Core Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3 and D4 of the London Plan (2021) and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
| No part of the flat roofs of the proposed dwellinghouse shall be used as or altered to form a balcony, roof terrace/garden or similar amenity area.

Reason: To protect the living conditions of occupants of nearby properties and future occupiers of the development, in accordance with policies 7A ,7B and 7D of the Ealing Development Management Plan (2013) and policies D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021).

| The detached outbuilding hereby approved shall be used only for domestic purposes incidental to the dwelling on this site, and shall not be used for separate habitable accommodation, letting or any commercial use. No cooking or kitchen facilities shall be installed at any time.

Reason: To ensure that the development does not detract from the amenity of the adjoining properties, and to enable the Local Planning Authority to retain control over the use of the building in accordance with policies 1.1 & 1.2 of the Ealing Development Strategy (2012), policies 7.4 & 7B of the Ealing Development Management Development Plan Document (2013), policies D3, D4 and D6 of the London Plan (2021), and the National Planning Policy Framework (2023).
description: Single storey rear extension (following demolition of existing rear addition); alterations to the existing outbuilding
